rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with an elegant reception area.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living room with colonial decor and natural light, oriented to the south-west according to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen, ideal for family gatherings, with a north-east view promoting prosperity.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Well-equipped modern kitchen designed for luxury cooking, with proper ventilation and natural lighting as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom with privacy features. Designed to be in the north-east quadrant as recommended by Vastu.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and attached walk-in closet, ideally located in the north-west for calm energy.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated workspace featuring a desk area and storage, oriented towards east for productivity as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Dressing Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the master bedroom for convenience.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Entertainment area with premium sound system and comfortable seating, placed in the south-east zone as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Garage
rooms.description: Spacious two-car garage with modern amenities and easy access to the main entrance.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Fully equipped luxury gym, located in a quiet area of the ground floor adhering to Vastu principles for health.

openings.description: Large ornate door with security features.
Floor-to-ceiling windows to enhance natural lighting while ensuring privacy.
